Hero.title: Recruit faster.
Hero.subtitle: Seeklon is an AI-powered ATS that can sort your applications in seconds.

WhyAtsIA.title: Why choose an AI ATS over a classic ATS?
WhyAtsIA.intro: Traditional ATS only search for keywords in CVs, ruling out qualified talent for technical reasons. Seeklon's semantic AI
WhyAtsIA.bodyMiddle: not words. Using natural language processing, our algorithm understands the context of experience, detects soft skills and identifies transferable skills. Result:
WhyAtsIA.savingsDesc: per hire: automation of sourcing (4h), CV screening (5h) and interview scheduling (3h).
WhyAtsIA.costDesc: By handling screening in-house with AI, you save on headhunter fees (15-20% of gross salary) while keeping quality.
WhyAtsIA.qualityDesc: Our AI analyzes soft skills and culture fit to reduce early turnover by 40%.
WhyAtsIA.trustDesc: Seeklon centralizes applications from LinkedIn, Indeed, Monster and generates personalized interview guides. Data hosted in France, GDPR compliance guaranteed.

Features.title: How does it work?
Features.subtitle: A full process, from job posting to interview.
Features.step1Desc: Draft your job posting in seconds with Seeklon's matrix.
Features.step2Desc: Publish your job on all job boards (Indeed, LinkedIn, etc.) and Seeklon centralizes all applications.
Features.step3Desc: Our algorithm analyzes and ranks CVs instantly to surface the best fits for your criteria.
Features.step4Desc: Seeklon generates a hiring interview guide. Confirm strengths and dig into areas to improve.

SocialProof.title: Testimonials
SocialProof.quote1: Seeklon transforms how SMBs approach recruiting. The tool saves precious time by surfacing only relevant profiles.
SocialProof.quote2: A major innovation to tackle recruiting challenges: screen with precision and qualify talent effectively.
SocialProof.quote3: A promising innovation that addresses real screening and candidate qualification needs.
